title: DualSense Cosmic Red & Midnight Black Reveal Trailer | PS5
author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/accessories/dualsense-wireless-controller/

Explore new gaming frontiers and ignite your gaming nights with two new galaxy-inspired DualSense™ wireless controller colors. Find out more at playstation.com/dualsense

localize.description:
https://www.playstation.com/accessories/dualsense-wireless-controller/

銀河をイメージしたDualSense™ワイヤレスコントローラーの新色2色で、ゲームの新境地を開拓し、ゲームナイトを盛り上げましょう。詳しくはplaystation.com/dualsenseをご覧ください。
localize.title: DualSense Cosmic Red & Midnight Black Reveal Trailer | PS5

localize.description:
https://www.playstation.com/accessories/dualsense-wireless-controller/

探索新的游戏领域，用两种新的银河系灵感的DualSense™无线控制器颜色点燃你的游戏之夜。了解更多信息，请访问playstation.com/dualsense。
localize.title: 宇宙红和午夜黑的DualSense揭幕预告片 | PS5

localize.description:
https://www.playstation.com/accessories/dualsense-wireless-controller/

探索新的遊戲領域，用兩種新的銀河系靈感的DualSense™無線控制器顏色點燃你的遊戲之夜。瞭解更多信息，請訪問playstation.com/dualsense。
localize.title: 宇宙紅和午夜黑的DualSense揭幕預告片 | PS5
